transArray.content: I changed rooms twice and the smell of cigarette smoke was strong.

Dear guests: Hello! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Xiaoju is very sad to see your feedback about your stay! The hotel rooms are all non-smoking rooms. We have reported it to the room manager as soon as possible. We will train the room attendants again on how to deal with the odor problem in the room and follow up whether it will be applied to subsequent work. If you have any needs during your stay, please feel free to contact us at any time. Contact the front desk and we will be by your side 24 hours a day! Looking forward to your next stay and wish you a happy life! Manager: Zhao Dan
